fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Class WebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.WebService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestResultReceiver.Receiver

    public abstract class WebService
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestResultReceiver.Receiver
    Helper which exposes simple asynchronous API to be used by the UI

    This class is used as singleton by RESTDroid. This class provides also a little factory for RESTRequest. First of all a Module must be registered. The role of this class is to prepare and to send the RestService request :

    • Check if the request has to be re-sent or not via Processor.checkRequest(RESTRequest)
    • Create the request Intent
    • Add the RESTRequest in mRequestCollection
    • Start the service

    Version:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy
    See Also:
    RESTDroid.getWebService(Class), Processor.checkRequest(RESTRequest), Module
